english.segment1: A nature to nurture. An instinct to sin. What's under me. The skin you live in. You trade your unlimited. Your precious creation. You will submit. You will get it
english.segment2: Suddenly I have no strength at all. So suddenly hit with all I've lost. Suddenly my world, is falling apart. So suddenly so suddenly. Suddenly
english.segment3: You say you're a victim. But that's just a symptom. You're so very clear. You volunteered. Why are you fighting just stop your denying. Own up to the sin. You bury within

english.segment6: I have no strength at all. I've been hit with a loss. So suddenly my world falls apart. I have no strength at all. I've been hit with a loss. Suddenly my world falls apart. My world, falls apart
